name: Ba Be lake - Ban Gioc waterfall (3D2N) - adventure feeling (upcoming this 30th, August)
description:
Beauty of Ba Be lake - one of 20 natural biggest lake in the world with wild caves, waterfalls, rivers...
Landscapes of valleys, winding roads along mountains with stilt houses around.
Enjoy good cooked meal and culture of Tay ethnic.
Behold Ban Gioc waterfall, 1 of 4 largest waterfalls along a national border and Nguom Ngao (Tiger) cave with wild, natural and unique karst stalactite.
